website_summaries.verdict: For consumers who prefer an all-natural product in a generous bottle for a low price, this is a good choice, but it doesn't work for everyone.
pros: Made of cold pressed, organic castor oil – a product that is known for boosting eyelash/eyebrow growth thanks to its Omega-6 acids
Cruelty and chemical free, and comes with applicators
cons: The consistency is thick and oily, making it somewhat difficult to apply
May cause somewhat blurry vision if you get it in your eyes
Not all users saw noticeable results

customer_reviews.title: Castor oil for eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I think this castor oil has given my eyelashes a bit more volume, after about one month of daily use. The oil is very thick, so I found that the best way to use, is to just use one drop on the eyelash brush and that is enough for both sets of eyelashes. Don’t try to dip the eyelash brush into the oil bottle, as that will bring up way too much oil. The package comes with the bottle of castor oil with a dropper, 5 eyelash brushes, and 5 eyeliner/eyebrow brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Jade D.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really worked for me. I have short eyelashes, I always have. They also lack natural curl. Since using this product for over a month I can safely say that when you apply it every evening you will notice a difference in length and strength! Make sure you take your contact lenses out first if you wear them. Also, try not to open your eyes very much after applying because it will irritate your eyes if it gets in them and make your vision a bit blurry. Try to make this the very last thing you do before bed.
customer_reviews.author: brickelle

customer_reviews.title: EYELASHES! WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my eyelashes which are definitely growing. I only wished that the eyelash brush was attached to the dropper - so that's what I did, I took off the bottom of the dropper and super glued the brush to the top. Now no fuss and no loss liquid switching things around!
customer_reviews.author: Imcega

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I tried eye lash serum that did work on my lash but not my brow. This castor oil really help to grow those tiny hair into something more visible. I use it just a few days, I can see those tiny eye is growing and I can use my brow gel better to get darker pigment. I cannot wait for it to grow full.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Significant eyelash growth!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this Castor oil for about two weeks with a couple days in between skipping using it and even with the missed days, my eyelashes have grown significantly. It’s amazing! I was skeptical about any growth happening but my eyelashes look much better already. I think my eyebrows are filling in but will require more use to see a big difference but I’m hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it... Really worked on my eyebrows. I see a difference already. :)
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Burns the eyes for days
customer_reviews.text: This product burned my eyes for 2 days straight my eyelids swelled and I had to keep flushing them with drops every few hours. I purchased this 2 years back and loved it but this is very different. I'm going to be returning
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: I'm using this to grow longer eyelashes, and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to grow longer eyelashes, and it seems to be working. Just apply a drop to each set of upper lashes each night before bed!
customer_reviews.author: whatsnvc

customer_reviews.title: ~ Easy to Use, SO Moisturizing, Nothing in here but Pure Organic Castor Oil ~
customer_reviews.text: This little Sky Organics Castor Oil Eyelash Enhancer Serum is an easy size to use. I just use the dropper to add a bit to one of the eyelash wands and then gently rub it into the brush. I use this on my eyelashes and eyebrows in the evening. I use the eyelash wand for both. This is so moisturizing and so easy to do each night. Nothing in here but pure organic Castor Oil. Lot number on bottom of bottle. Very nice product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product to apply to delicate eye area
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is thick and gunky and messy. I don't understand why they put it in a bottle with a lid that has a dropper attached to it. Every time I would remove the lid the oil would overflow and run down the sides of the bottle. Putting this stuff on your eye of lashes is like putting molasses on your eyes!! I thought to myself well instead of trying to use it on my eyelashes I will use it to soften my heels and elbows but it just got too thick and gunky so I couldn't use it and I threw it away. Will not be buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Markwell

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great for hair growth! I put it on my lashes and brows every night gor the last month or so, and it's already done a great job of lengthening my lashes! Its nice that the product came with brushes too!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Caused allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This product caused a horrible allergic reaction. Swelled eyes and skin rash so bad I had to go to the doctor and take steroids. I'm sure not everyone would have this reaction, but if you're sensitive to plant based things like I am it could happen. Company refunded my money quickly. Otherwise it seemed like a nice product and was easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: For me, this is a product I need to stay away from
customer_reviews.text: Not all products are for all people. I tried using the castor oil to grow out my eye lashes, but it was very irritating after only one evening, so I stopped. Others, however, have had different experiences with this, good experiences. I think the product overall is wonderful. It just didn't work for me. You live; you learn...
customer_reviews.author: Izzie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Sky organics has the BEST natural products. The castor oil helped me with my eyebrow and eyelash issue. As someone who grew up in the late 90’s I over plucked my eyebrows and they stopped growing. Now, I have my eyebrows back! It’s miraculous and I’m super happy! My eyelashes have also gotten fuller and longer!
customer_reviews.author: MartaKat

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely helping my eyelashes grow. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely helping my eyelashes grow. I have also been trying it on the thinning part of my head. Keeping my fingers crossed. Lost lots of hair because of illness and medication.
customer_reviews.author: rita franco palazzo

customer_reviews.title: This ACTUALLY helps eyelash growth!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for almost a week and I can already see a difference in my lashes. I have purchased multiple high end brand products specifically for eyelash growth and had similar results but paid a lot more for them! My only complaint is that this is MESSY. When you take the top off to get product on the eyelash brush it gets on everything because it pours out of the dropper instantly. I think this would be better without the dropper where you could simply dip the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Snider

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t seen comments about the application so I thought I’d give an honest review. I don’t know why I thought putting oil on my eyelashes was a good idea. It got in my eyes which caused blurred vision and irritation. No matter how carefully I applied the oil to my lashes it always ended up getting into my eyes. I used it for a couple days before I was tired of it
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I add it to coconut oil to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I add it to coconut oil to make body/face lotion and it's wonderful! Results in very soft clear skin! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie G.

customer_reviews.title: Never again...
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews instead of being trigger happy and purchasing it. I could have gotten the same thing but a bigger bottle for a cheaper price. You live you learn. Never purchasing this item from this vendor/amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Melina Canadas

customer_reviews.title: Good with applicator but pricer
customer_reviews.text: Basically I use castor oil every day for my eye brow and lashes .When I ce across this product with applicator brush ,I wanted to give it a try .Its really nice and application is mesh free .U can get the good result for regular application .But this oil seems whiter in color than regular castor oil .I I m not sure why. But th me smell is same like regular castor oil .Pricer for small bottle though .If u wanted to buy with the applicator ,it’s a good buy .Skse regular castor oil would work
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: It workssss!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I swear by this product! I bought it just after my eyelash extensions completely falls off and most of my lashes went with the extensions. I was so frustrated coz my eyes looks so weird without most of my real lashes. After 3 days of using this oil I can see the difference! I’m glad I bought it. I’m on my week two and the ends of my lashes started curling. This is wayyy better than Grande LashMD! That one irritates my lids.
customer_reviews.author: Ricah S

customer_reviews.title: Potential lash growth
customer_reviews.text: The purpose of the oil for me was to grow my eyelashes. I haven’t used it long enough to determine if my lashes have grown. But I love the texture and that it does not burn eyes when I do apply it. So far I’m impressed with the product but I still need to give it time to be a good judge of it.
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: No difference. These reviewers are paid promos
customer_reviews.text: used everyday for 2 weeks. Absolutely no difference. I'll continue to rub castor oil from a large bottle like I normally do all over my body. This just makes you oily.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this product is amazing. I have been applying this for about a week and I already see a difference. My eyelashes fall out easily when I use an eyelash curler. When starting this product, I have not noticed any lashes fall out. I apply the oil every night before bed. I don't use the brushes and apply a little on my finger then stroke my finger on my lashes. The brushes are good though for when I comb and fill in my eyebrows. The last eyelash serum I tried, it made my lashes fall out. I highly recommended this product for longer looking lashes. The product was well packaged when it came delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural alternative for growing lashes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product as far as my skin and eyes didn't get irritated. I didn't notice the difference right away but other people have comment on how much fuller my lashes look and if I am wearing macara. Overall, I prefer this better than using the expenses lash solution in the market. I'm pretty happy with the price result and it's natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Good results and safe to use!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product nightly for the past 2-3 weeks and my eyelashes look so much healthier and longer. I use to use Vaseline and got barely any results once I used this I was blown away with the progress that was already occurring. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Adams

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive solutions that i love!
customer_reviews.text: Can get over my castor oil eyelash serum! I apply it before going to bed. I have think hair but this product has helped me to fill the gaps in my eyebrows and eyelashes! Clean ingredientes, awesome brand!
customer_reviews.author: Maite

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for brow growth!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this oil mainly in my eyebrows and I’ve seen growth in as little as 2 weeks. I love that this kit comes with brushes and spoolies for brows and lashes! There is also a generous amount of product for a great price. This bottle will last me a long time! Thanks for making this product in the USA 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with lash and hairline thinning. I have only been using for a few days so nothing notable to report. I do find it easy to use and appreciate the various applicators provided.
customer_reviews.author: P. Luster

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad! 😇
customer_reviews.text: I like using it when I take breaks from eyelash extensions extensions. I didn’t notice a length difference or anything but I think they looked stronger and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! I use this when I get out of the shower & when I go to bed. It has made my lashes a bit fuller & has helped my eyebrows grow some. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Song

customer_reviews.title: Caused eye irritation
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as directed on my eyelashes 2 nights in a row before bed and developed irritation and swelling that prevented me from wearing contact lenses for over a week.
customer_reviews.author: mariann

customer_reviews.title: it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I pulled out all my real lashes after having a really bad eyelash extension experience and i pulled out majority of all my real eyelashes and was left with bald spots, i used to have natural thick lashes. After applying this to my eyelash line every single night i have seen dramatic results. It has only been a month and im sure after 2 more months my eyelashes will be back to normal. I love this product it really works. you have to be consistent with it every night before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Very messy to dispense
customer_reviews.text: To try to get one drop on a Q-tip is impossible. The eyedropper comes out completely coated and drips all over, plus oil comes out the top of the eyedropper, on the outside of the bottle. So very very messy to deal with every night. On the plus side, my eyebrows are filling in quickly since I started applying this oil.
customer_reviews.author: KC in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Really like this castor oil!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product so far! I’ve been using it for about two weeks now and I feel like there’s a tiny but noticeable difference in my lashes and brows. It doesn’t irritate my eyes either which was something I was initially concerned about. The consistency of the oil is thick but smooth. The dropper is a little tricky to use in terms of messiness, but it hasn’t caused any real issues for me!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and it works to. Several years ago, I burned my eyelashes. I was lighting the gas water heater and it exploded in my face. And burned my eyelashes. This product has helped my eyelashes. Also nice it came with extra brushes. Prompt shipping. Will definitely buy from this seller again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pistol Pete

customer_reviews.title: 100% Vegan !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is 100% Vegan and No Cruelty to ANY animals are involved. It’s very easy to use and I’m using it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: maria merenda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this is organic and has everything you need included. It has a dropper in the oil along with 5 brushes for your eyelashes and another 5 for your eyebrows. A little oil on the brushes is all you will need and this bottle will definitely last you a really long time!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally write review but this product is really ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write review but this product is really working. I've noticed a difference in the thickness and length of my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Terie

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love how clean and refreshing this makes my body feel. I’m so glad I found a company that actually is truthful about the products they create. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: charleagh2525

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Works so well, my lashes got so much longer in a week. Would not recommend on brows because the oil is getting on your face while sleeping and cause small bumps on your face. Sometimes gets a little messy, but 100% worth the result.
customer_reviews.author: Anelia

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Once I receive my order, I have been using it at night on my lashes and eyebrows and I have seen major improvements. I am happy I brought this product. Castor Oil is number one for making your hair grow fast. You have to use it consistently and be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Neworleans Vee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I used the complete bottle and I didn't see no difference on my eyelashes. Waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Kemp

customer_reviews.title: her eyelashes have never looked better. I am going to start using this product ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this, her eyelashes have never looked better. I am going to start using this product too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this really does work and its a great alternative if you want to avoid toxic chemicals in other products
customer_reviews.author: David & Emily Lewis

customer_reviews.title: High viscosity
customer_reviews.text: Very high viscosity. I use it at night. Leaves my eyebrow and lashes area very oily.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mc

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than I thought it would! I've tried rapidlash and a few others to help with sparse areas of my brows and none worked as good or as quickly as castor oil. I really do love the brushes in this kit, application is much better with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Sky organics is a high quality company
customer_reviews.text: Thick, high quality oil with applicator brushes. I have been using it for both eyelashes and eye area conditioning. I really like the results. Great for overnight lip care as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great product and so is the quality however the dosing system is not easy to use but I assume it is because of the consistency of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Monitita

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the oil is good.
customer_reviews.text: Oil is very thick one has to dilute the oil before applying to eye lashes. The quality of the oil is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sajjad Bhullar

customer_reviews.title: I have only been using this product for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for a few days and I can already see results. I'm excited about what results I'll see after using this product for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it long enough to know if it helps with growth and I do already have long eyelashes, but it definitely helps with moisturizing them. It makes my mascara go on more smoothly the next day. It is easy to use and doesn’t irritate my eyes like coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gomez

customer_reviews.title: #excited
customer_reviews.text: Thick but smells great! So easy to apply and cant wait for the results! 👌👌🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: S.Sketches

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Applicators
customer_reviews.text: Getting into the mode of using castor oil every day to help increase my eyelash growth. Not sure if I can say it works yet since its a little early but the amount of applicators this comes with is great, and its nice to have two types of applicators.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Palma

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions
customer_reviews.text: My cousin and I use this and have gotten a lot of growth. Doesn’t irritate your eyes. Use before bed

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using a week, but definitely see a difference!

customer_reviews.title: way to thick!
customer_reviews.text: hard to use! expensive! just buy a bottle of castor oil from the drugstore!!

customer_reviews.text: Castor oil is the big thing in making lashes grow. This has brushes too. Great find!!!!

customer_reviews.title: This is great for your skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: This is great for your skin and hair...but because it is an oil...I only apply it around my eyes at night before bed, so it does not irritate my eyes! This does make my hair really soft!!

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have used this everyday and it still didnt make my lashes long.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency and I’ll update my review once I start seeing results and also try not to get it in your eyes it will burn😬

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to see results!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in hopes it will help my eyelashes grow. Ive been using it every other day for a week, mild itching after application, but hoping that will go away.
customer_reviews.author: jnylyn

customer_reviews.title: but when I used it on my lashes it made my eyelids super dry and itchy so I used a hydrating eye ...
customer_reviews.text: my brows finally started growing again! I only wish it was a little faster lol;; but when I used it on my lashes it made my eyelids super dry and itchy so I used a hydrating eye serum for about a week or so

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money on any of the expensive eyelash serums! Buy this and you WILL be satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with the provided items. It can be messy due to it being an oil. I noticed some thickening of the lashes but I will admit some I have skipped applying the product some nights

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed lengthening of my lashes but to be fair, mine are really short. What I've noticed is that my lashes seem stronger when I curl them. I also don't get a lot of lash falls when I remove hard to remove waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: argylefragile

customer_reviews.title: Coats Lashes well
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this oil long enough to see results but I like that it's thick enough to coat your lashes without running into your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: rnspender

customer_reviews.title: Very rich and nice!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily on my face, hands and feet. Sometimes just this on my face at night. Makes my skin so soft! First experience using castor oil and I love this one!

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a dirty and open box, and the whole thing had a faint stench of bleach. But the product remained secure and non-damaged. Overall good.

customer_reviews.title: I've only been using this product a few days but ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product a few days but I definitely see a difference. Can't wait to see the results after a month.

customer_reviews.title: Longer lashes
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it made my eyelashes look longer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is a little bit awkward to use because it comes in a dropper bottle but you have to use the small swiping brush to actually apply the product, but with regular use I have definitely noticed longer lashes within a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Svihovec

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really see any eyebrow growth results after using it about a month. Maybe it needs to be used longer, I don't know. But it doesn't smell, and a little does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Guys go for this product.. that works for me.. Goodluck.

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for my lashes, brows,-!: baby hairs. I also use it on my 7 year olds lashes. They look amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work, but after almost a week of using it I see new hair growth! Great value. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Castor oil yaaaay
customer_reviews.text: Came fast, packages well, instructions are clear.......cant wait to see results😊

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff my eyebrows are very dark now and full... also my eye lashes have grown and gotten darker. Love this product!

customer_reviews.text: I tried it for a month straight and no results.

customer_reviews.title: This is great, my eyelashes have grown longer and fully in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, my eyelashes have grown longer and fully in only a couple of weeks. Wasn’t sure if this would work but highly recommend it instead of paying hundreds for eyelash serum that doesn’t work. It is really thick and doesn’t run into your eyes and a really large bottle will last for a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: Once i opened the packaging, I could already tell it has been touched.. I'm missing the eyelash brush...... thank god the bottle itself is sealed with plastic though.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as eye drops to remove incipient cataracts.

customer_reviews.text: One word AMAZING and the products comes with an ebook to facilitate the product and more.

customer_reviews.text: OMG. I see the difference already. It's simple amazing. ❤

customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping ..just not as fast as wanted or thought it would

customer_reviews.title: Better shipping needed-
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to try this, however it arrived- thrown on my porch, box completely squished and torn. Grateful the wands, applicators and actual bottle were still in great condition.

customer_reviews.text: I Really liked this product! I use the Organic castor oil on my eyebrows and eyelashes and it feels amazing. The little brushes are just right for applying the oil.

customer_reviews.text: Product included 4 eyelash brushes but the 4 advertised eyebrow brushes were missing. I just started using the oil so it's too early to report on the results.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet but like the darkening effect.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this long enough to see if it works for the purpose advertised.However for me a great side effect is that It makes My eyelashes darker. No more tinting.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect this tiny bottle for the price . Bottle and be reusable
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: The images of what is sold and the actual item is disiving
customer_reviews.text: I love that the fact that it’s organic and it has good reviews . But what it’s is advertised with the picture and all on here is very disiving because they make the product look larger that it really is. So your thinking your getting a bigger bottle than what it really is . So disappointed not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: YERITZA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great product
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great. Came with the Applicators needed to apply the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I’m hoping to see results soon.
customer_reviews.author: toosweetangel12

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is super thick but I use it for bed and I don’t apply too much. After a week of using it I saw a difference in the length of my eyelashes. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it.I am using as a moisturizer for skin & hair. Goes on oily but is obsorbed very quickly leaving nice soft skin. Really enjoyed the ebook with recipes and suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Organic Castor Oil Eyelash Serum by Sky Organics (1 oz) USDA Organic Cold-Pressed 100% Pure Castor Oil Natural Eyelash Serum Hexane-free Castor Oil with Mascara Brushes for Eyelashes and Eyebrows
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 1 oz. dropper bottle of 100% pure, cold-pressed, hexane-free USDA Organic Castor Oil for eyelashes and eyebrows.
Natural Castor Oil Lash Booster: A popular hair oil, Castor Oil is a natural source of fatty acids that nourish and condition lash and brow hairs.
No Harsh Ingredients: Our single-ingredient eyelash serum contains no synthetic ingredients, fragrance, stimulants, or alcohol, and is made up of ONLY 100% pure, organic Castor Oil.
FREE Lash and Brow Applicators: Sky Organics Castor Oil Eyelash Serum includes 10 free mascara and liner brushes to make application safe and easy.
Responsibly Made: Sky Organics Castor Oil is responsibly sourced from small farms in India and bottled in the USA. It’s 100% vegan and cruelty-free too!
